channel.title: Daily Express :: World Feed
channel.description: Simply The Best 7 Days A Week

item.title: Iran-Israel LIVE: Donald Trump backs down from WW3 as he tries to strike deal with Tehran
item.description: US President Donald Trump has said that Iran wants to meet and he "may do that", as he says he has "ideas as to what to do" regarding the conflict.
item.author: Ciaran McGrath,Emily Wright,William Morgan
item.media:keywords: Donald Trump, Military, Iran, Middle East, Iran-Israel conflict, Trump, US military deployment, Middle East tensions, US-Iran tensions, Trump military deployment, Middle East conflict, Iran's Supreme Leader.

media:content.media:description: Donald Trump and Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Khamenei
media:content.media:credit: SR Pablo Chavez/USS Carl Vinson / SWNS

media:thumbnail.media:description: Donald Trump and Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Khamenei
media:thumbnail.media:credit: SR Pablo Chavez/USS Carl Vinson / SWNS

item.title: Rabies hotspots MAPPED: Where you're most likely to be infected with deadly disease
item.description: The deadly disease has claimed the life of a Briton after they were bitten by a stray dog in Morocco.
item.author: Vikki White,Michael D. Carroll
item.media:keywords: World Health Organization, Maps, rabies, UK Health Security Agency, travel warnings, Asia and Africa rabies hotspots

item.title: Hurricane Erick path mapped as storm rapidly intensifies to Category 2 in Pacific
item.description: Erick is the fifth tropical storm of the Eastern Pacific hurricane season and is forecast to rapidly intensify into a major hurricane as it moves toward Mexico
item.author: Nina Joudeh,Michael D. Carroll
item.media:keywords: NOAA, Hurricane, Hurricane Erick, Eastern Pacific hurricane season, Mexico, National Hurricane Centre

media:content.media:description: The National Hurricane Center reported that Tropical Storm Erick is intensifying in speed and is expected to develop into a major hurricane before making landfall.

media:thumbnail.media:description: The National Hurricane Center reported that Tropical Storm Erick is intensifying in speed and is expected to develop into a major hurricane before making landfall.

item.title: Crisis in Spain as popular holiday hotspot hit by huge crime wave
item.description: There is an ongoing battle in the area with shootings, kidnappings, and gang violence.
item.author: Rebecca Robinson
item.media:keywords: Costa del Sol, Malaga, Crime, Spain, Malaga crime wave, Costa del Sol violence, British nationals arrested, Operation Hawthorn

media:content.media:description: Police in Malaga have revealed a number of their investigations over the past 18 months.

media:thumbnail.media:description: Police in Malaga have revealed a number of their investigations over the past 18 months.

item.title: Air India plane crash survivor details exact moment he realised aircraft was going down
item.description: Vishwash Ramesh had been travelling with his brother Ajay on the Air India flight.
item.author: Sarah Barltrop
item.media:keywords: Air India plane crash, Plane, Flights, Ahmedabad, Vishwash Ramesh

media:content.media:description: Vishwash Ramesh was the only survivor of the Air India plane crash

media:thumbnail.media:description: Vishwash Ramesh was the only survivor of the Air India plane crash

item.title: Air India plane crash survivor reveals exactly how he escaped flight for first time
item.description: The Air India plane crash survivor, Vishwash Ramesh, has shared details on how he escaped the plane.
item.author: Emily Wright
item.media:keywords: India, Air India plane crash, Plane, Aircraft, Vishwash Ramesh, survivor's guilt, Captain Sumeet Sabharwal, it's a miracle, killed 279 people, seat 11a, Boeing 787 Dreamliner, fuselage, Ajay, 11J, feel terrible, Diu

media:content.media:description: The Air India plane crash survivor has shared details on the moment he knew the plane was going down

media:thumbnail.media:description: The Air India plane crash survivor has shared details on the moment he knew the plane was going down

item.title: ‘World’s biggest’ great white shark heading for popular beaches as urgent warning issued
item.description: The 14-foot great white shark could pose a threat to swimmers on popular beaches this summer.
item.author: Eleanor Burleigh
item.media:keywords: Great white shark, Sharks, Beaches, Contender, USA

media:content.media:description: The 30-year-old shark has travelled nearly 1,870 miles this year

media:thumbnail.media:description: The 30-year-old shark has travelled nearly 1,870 miles this year

item.title: Harrowing moment girl falls nearly 50ft to the ground during holiday with parents
item.description: The young girl is now undergoing treatment in hospital after the fall.
item.author: Rebecca Robinson,Tahir Ibn Manzoor
item.media:keywords: India, Accident, Tourism, Trisha Bijwe, zipline accident, safety regulations, adventure tourism, girl falls off zipline india

media:content.media:description: A young girl fell off a zipline in India while on holiday with her family.

media:thumbnail.media:description: A young girl fell off a zipline in India while on holiday with her family.

item.title: European seaside town loved by Brits says ‘too many tourists’ - on brink of bus ban
item.description: The popular tourist destination is considering banning tour operator buses.
item.author: Emily Wright
item.media:keywords: France, Overtourism, Cruise (section), Tourism, United Nations, Nice tourism, overtourism, Christian Estrosi, sustainable tourism, banned cruises, 900 passengers, Villefranche-sur-Mer, destructive mass tourism, quality accommodation, hotel investment

media:content.media:description: France's second-most popular tourist destination is considering banning tour operator buses.

item.title: Couple booted off Ryanair flight after money-saving trick goes wrong
item.description: A horrified holidaymaker discovered that a common hack to save money on Ryanair flights backfired - when he was booted off without a refund as he 'hadn't reserved a seat'.
item.author: Demi Koutouzi

media:content.media:description: Scott McCormick and Helena Boshwick said they were bumped from the plane
